name: Espresso
description: A concentrated shot of rich, bold coffee with a strong aroma and deep flavor. Perfect for a quick energy boost.

name: Cappuccino
description: A balanced blend of espresso, steamed milk, and foam. Creamy on top with a strong coffee base, often dusted with cocoa.

name: Latte
description: A smooth, milky coffee with a mild espresso flavor, topped with a light layer of foam. Comforting and easy to drink.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: A layered drink with espresso, steamed milk, and caramel syrupâ€”rich, sweet, and slightly bold.
